message.content:
We begin by identifying the three ratios and the formulas we need to use:

1. Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio =
  (Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities) / (Net Profit)

2. Current Assets Turnover Ratio =
  (Total Revenue) / (Average Current Assets)
  where Average Current Assets = (Beginning Current Assets + Ending Current Assets) / 2

3. Quick Ratio =
  (Quick Assets) / (Current Liabilities)
  where Quick Assets = Cash on Hand + Bank Deposits + Interest Receivable + Accounts Receivable

Below are the detailed calculations:

───────────────────────────── 
Step 1: Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio

• From the cash flow statement:
  Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = –862455.97
• From the income statement:
  Net Profit = 1903401.82

So,
  Ratio = (–862455.97) / (1903401.82) ≈ –0.453
Rounded to two decimals, this is –0.45.

───────────────────────────── 
Step 2: Current Assets Turnover Ratio

• From the balance sheet:
  Beginning Current Assets = 8000000.00 (as of 2023-12-31)
  Ending Current Assets = 10619895.35 (as of 2024-02-05)

Calculate the average current assets:
  Average = (8000000.00 + 10619895.35) / 2 = 18619895.35 / 2 = 9309947.675

• From the income statement:
  Total Revenue = 4879769.51

Thus,
  Current Assets Turnover Ratio = 4879769.51 / 9309947.675 ≈ 0.524
Rounded to two decimals, this is 0.52.

───────────────────────────── 
Step 3: Quick Ratio

• From the balance sheet (all values at end date 2024-02-05):
  Cash on Hand = 4058544.03
  Bank Deposits = 3079000.00
  Interest Receivable = 13279.60
  Accounts Receivable = 2984071.72

Add these to calculate Quick Assets:
  Quick Assets = 4058544.03 + 3079000.00 = 7137544.03  
                        + 13279.60 = 7150823.63  
                        + 2984071.72 = 10134895.35

• Current Liabilities (from the balance sheet) at end date:
  Total Current Liabilities = 624988.48

Thus,
  Quick Ratio = 10134895.35 / 624988.48 ≈ 16.2158
Rounded to two decimals, this is 16.22.

───────────────────────────── 
Final Answer in JSON Format:

{
  "solution": {
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "-0.45",
    "Current Assets Turnover Ratio": "0.52",
    "Quick Ratio": "16.22"
  }
}
